values: Do Not Be Conformed to This World: The Indigenous and Pilgrim Principle of Christian LivingDo Not Be Conformed to This World: The Indigenous and Pilgrim Principle of Christian Living

Jesus’s people are in the world, but not of the world. We work for the good of our temporary homes while we always long for more.Jesus’s people are in the world, but not of the world. We work for the good of our temporary homes while we always long for more.
